Rodrigo Nascentes

It's all about data, code and churrasco.

Hi, I'm Rodrigo Nascentes. I'm a database engineer and am always looking to automate manual tasks to make the DBA life easier. I am a confirmed nerd, an avid scuba diver, a volleyball player and a fabulous barbecue cook. I live in Porto Alegre, RS, Brasil.

I created sp_who3 an open source alternative to the sp_who for SQL Server.

I use Twitter a lot (mostly tweet in Portuguese) but I usually don't speak about technology so much, my account is @ronascentes. I also have LinkedIn, GitHub and GitHub Gist.

If you are asking yourself, Churrasco is the term for a barbecue which originated in southern Brazil.
